root.name: Nanatsu Kaze no Shima Monogatari
root.description: OverviewNanatsu Kaze no Shima Monogatari (Tales of the Seven Wind Islands) is a Japanese adventure game for the Sega Saturn developed by Givro and published by Enix in 1997. The title was the last game developed by Givro before the company closed its doors the year of Nanatsu Kaze no Shima Monogatari's release.
